verses.verse: Observe <S%H8104><s%> the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%>, and keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: for in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

Thou shalt therefore sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, of the flock <S%H6629><s%> and the herd <S%H1241><s%>, in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there.

Thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> no leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> with it; seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> therewith, even the bread <S%H3899><s%> of affliction <S%H6040><s%>; for thou camest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in haste <S%H2649><s%>: that thou mayest remember <S%H2142><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> when thou camest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life <S%H2416><s%>.

And there shall be no leavened bread <S%H7603><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> with thee in all thy coast <S%H1366><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; neither shall there any thing of the flesh <S%H1320><s%>, which thou sacrificedst <S%H2076><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, remain <S%H3885><s%> all night until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

Thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> not sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> within any <S%H259><s%> of thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee: sacrifice: or, kill

But at the place <S%H4725><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in, there thou shalt sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, at the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, at the season <S%H4150><s%> that thou camest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And thou shalt roast <S%H1310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>: and thou shalt turn <S%H6437><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> unto thy tents <S%H168><s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>: and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn assembly <S%H6116><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> no work <S%H4399><s%> therein. solemn: Heb. restraint

Seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> shalt thou number <S%H5608><s%> unto thee: begin <S%H2490><s%> to number <S%H5608><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> from such time as thou beginnest <S%H2490><s%> to put the sickle <S%H2770><s%> to the corn <S%H7054><s%>.

And thou shalt keep <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with a tribute <S%H4530><s%> of a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> of thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, which thou shalt give <S%H5414><s%> unto the LORD thy God, according as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thee: a tribute: or, sufficiency

And thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, thou, and thy son <S%H1121><s%>, and thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and thy manservant <S%H5650><s%>, and thy maidservant <S%H519><s%>, and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, and the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that are among <S%H7130><s%> you, in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there.
And thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> that thou wast a bondman <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and thou shalt observe <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> these statutes <S%H2706><s%>.

Thou shalt observe <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, after that thou hast gathered <S%H622><s%> in thy corn <S%H1637><s%> and thy wine <S%H3342><s%>: corn: Heb. floor, and thy winepress

And thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in thy feast <S%H2282><s%>, thou, and thy son <S%H1121><s%>, and thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and thy manservant <S%H5650><s%>, and thy maidservant <S%H519><s%>, and the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, and the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that are within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou keep a solemn feast <S%H2287><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>: because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> thee in all thine increase <S%H8393><s%>, and in all the works <S%H4639><s%> of thine hands <S%H3027><s%>, therefore thou shalt surely rejoice <S%H8056><s%>.

Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> shall all thy males <S%H2138><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose <S%H977><s%>; in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>, and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%>, and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>: and they shall not appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> empty <S%H7387><s%>:

Every man <S%H376><s%> shall give as he is able <S%H4979><s%> <S%H3027><s%>, according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> which he hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee. as: Heb. according to the gift of his hand

Judges <S%H8199><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> shalt thou make <S%H5414><s%> thee in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee, throughout thy tribes <S%H7626><s%>: and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with just <S%H6664><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

Thou shalt not wrest <S%H5186><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>; thou shalt not respect <S%H5234><s%> persons <S%H6440><s%>, neither take <S%H3947><s%> a gift <S%H7810><s%>: for a gift <S%H7810><s%> doth blind <S%H5786><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%>, and pervert <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>. words: or, matters

That which is altogether <S%H6664><s%> just <S%H6664><s%> shalt thou follow <S%H7291><s%>, that thou mayest live <S%H2421><s%>, and inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee. That which: Heb. Justice, justice

Thou shalt not plant <S%H5193><s%> thee a grove <S%H842><s%> of any trees <S%H6086><s%> near unto <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, which thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> thee.
Neither shalt thou set thee up <S%H6965><s%> any image <S%H4676><s%>; which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hateth <S%H8130><s%>. image: or, statue, or, pillar
